alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 2:36AM MST until February 21 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches with local amounts near a foot. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet with local amounts up to 3 feet possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 AM MST Tuesday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late tonight through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
